extension.summary: The Python X Library is intended to be a fully functional X client library for Python programs.
extension.description: The Python X Library is intended to be a fully functional X client library for Python programs. It is written entirely in Python, in contrast to earlier X libraries for Python (the ancient X extension and the newer plxlib) which were interfaces to the C Xlib.
